scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:fonts && npm run validate:sitemap && npm run validate:llms
scripts.sitemap:validate: npm run sitemap:generate && npm run validate:sitemap
scripts.llms:validate: npm run llms:generate && npm run validate:llms
scripts.generate:all: npm run sitemap:generate && npm run llms:generate
scripts.optimize:all: npm run optimize:advanced && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: git pull --rebase && npm run generate:all && git add -A && npm version patch -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: git pull --rebase && npm run generate:all && git add -A && npm version minor -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: git pull --rebase && npm run generate:all && git add -A && npm version major -m 'chore(release): %s' && git push && git push origin --tags
